settings.name: ref
settings.description: The ref to the syn-action being invoked

settings.name: resURI
settings.description: The reference to the resource URI, either can be res:// or file://

settings.name: uriType
settings.description: The type of resource URI. Eg flowURI or catalystmlURI

input.name: input
input.description: The input to the action being called

output.name: output
output.description: The output of the action being called
